title: Kafka Dev Services fails to start since 2.16.0

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

I'm getting this error since I upgraded to 2.16.0 when running Kafka Dev Services on my Gitlab CI. Please tell me if you need a reproducer.
